long_description: This GoPro roll bar mount lets your easily and securely attach your GoPro camera to bike frames, roof racks, roll bars, tubes and more. Mount fits any tube or bar with a diameter of 1.4 - 2.5 in. Comes with 3-way pivoting arms that let you orient your camera to to any angle for the perfect shot. The GoPro roll bar mount is compatible with all HERO3, HERO2 and HD HERO Original cameras.
short_description: This GoPro roll bar mount lets your easily and securely attach your GoPro camera to bike frames, roof racks, roll bars, tubes and more.
